title: System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data.
body:
### Bug description

We are using .NET 8, [Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design 8.0.4](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design/8.0.4) and [Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 8.0.4](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL/8.0.4). Our database is PostgreSQL 10.23.

We have a simple PostgreSQL table which was created and populated using the following SQL query:

```sql
CREATE TABLE fit3.product (
    id serial4 NOT NULL,
    config jsonb,
    CONSTRAINT product_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
INSERT INTO fit3.product(config) VALUES (null);
INSERT INTO fit3.product(config) VALUES ('null');
INSERT INTO fit3.product(config) VALUES ('{"CPU": "ARM"}');
```

We are using database-first approach - we scaffolded the database to obtain the following C# model:

```cs
[Table("product", Schema = "fit3")]
public partial class Product
{
    [Key]
    [Column("id")]
    public int Id { get; set; }

    [Column("config", TypeName = "jsonb")]
    public string? Config { get; set; }
}
```

We also defined the following 2 classes which represent JSON for the configuration:

```cs
public partial class Product
{
    public Config? ConfigJSON { get; set; }
}

public class Config
{
    public string? CPU { get; set; }
}
```

We performed the mapping from jsonb column to our `Config` C# class inside `OnModelCreatingPartial`:

```cs
partial void OnModelCreatingPartial(ModelBuilder modelBuilder)
{
    modelBuilder.Entity<Product>(entity =>
    {
        entity.OwnsOne(x => x.ConfigJSON, t =>
        {
            t.ToJson("config");
        });
    });
}
```

However, when we perform the following simple query ...

```cs
var products = _fitDBContext.Products.ToList();
```

... the following exception is thrown:

```
'iisexpress.exe' (CoreCLR: clrhost): Loaded 'C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App\8.0.10\System.Net.NetworkInformation.dll'. Skipped loading symbols. Module is optimized and the debugger option 'Just My Code' is enabled.
Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Model.Validation: Warning: Sensitive data logging is enabled. Log entries and exception messages may include sensitive application data; this mode should only be enabled during development.
Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command: Information: Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p.id, p.config, p.config
FROM fit3.product AS p
'iisexpress.exe' (CoreCLR: clrhost): Loaded 'C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App\8.0.10\System.Diagnostics.StackTrace.dll'. Skipped loading symbols. Module is optimized and the debugger option 'Just My Code' is enabled.
'iisexpress.exe' (CoreCLR: clrhost): Loaded 'C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App\8.0.10\System.Reflection.Metadata.dll'. Skipped loading symbols. Module is optimized and the debugger option 'Just My Code' is enabled.
Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query: Error: An exception occurred while iterating over the results of a query for context type 'FitView.Data.Fit.Models.FitDBContext'.
System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 4.
   at System.Text.Json.ThrowHelper.ThrowJsonReaderException(Utf8JsonReader& json, ExceptionResource resource, Byte nextByte, ReadOnlySpan`1 bytes)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ConsumeNextToken(Byte marker)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ConsumeNextTokenOrRollback(Byte marker)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ReadSingleSegment()
   at lambda_method89(Closure, QueryContext, Object[], JsonReaderData)
   at lambda_method88(Closure, QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator)
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1.Enumerator.MoveNext()

System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 4.
   at System.Text.Json.ThrowHelper.ThrowJsonReaderException(Utf8JsonReader& json, ExceptionResource resource, Byte nextByte, ReadOnlySpan`1 bytes)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ConsumeNextToken(Byte marker)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ConsumeNextTokenOrRollback(Byte marker)
   at System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ReadSingleSegment()
   at lambda_method89(Closure, QueryContext, Object[], JsonReaderData)
   at lambda_method88(Closure, QueryContext, DbDataReader, ResultContext, SingleQueryResultCoordinator)
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1.Enumerator.MoveNext()
Exception thrown: 'System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException' in Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational.dll
```

### Provider and version information

EF Core version: 8.0.4
Database provider: Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 8.0.4
Target framework: .NET 8
Operating system: Windows 11 x64
IDE: Visual Studio Professional 64-bit 17.11.5
